document.full_text: anthony kim is still amazed that he won last year's houston open after a woeful driving performance but he plans to play with a similar attitude for his title defense this week.
document.title: anthony kim aims to replicate winning attitude at houston open
lines_and_colors: anthony kim is still amazed that he won last year's houston open after a woeful driving performance but he plans to play with a similar attitude for his title defense this week.
